title: Sakanwa
author: Sakanwa
content: In the forth coming election I am asking this to know what is really going on and how is it going to be, because alot of the citizens of Nigeria has really drop confident of vote because of what is going on, so how my question is what are your advice to the citizens on the forth coming election. Will you advise them to vote or not base on the current issues at hand.

comments.author: SOKO-DEKE
comments.body: Quote from: Sakanwa on February 21, 2023, 12:59:28 PMIn the forth coming election I am asking this to know what is really going on and how is it going to be, because alot of the citizens of Nigeria has really drop confident of vote because of what is going on, so how my question is what are your advice to the citizens on the forth coming election. Will you advise them to vote or not base on the current issues at hand.I have no idea what issues you're referring to, but whatever they may be, the best way to address every issue in this nation is for the people go out and cast their votes on election days.i believe that if we choose not to cast our votes on election day, our problems will not be resolved. Because some of our problems we are facing in this country are coming from our bad governments. Therefore, it is now up to us to select the best candidate among contents in elections day. So I'd like to encourage people to take advantage of this chance and cast their votes for their preferred candidates. Always remember this opportunity are only coming in after four years.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: I really do not pick the angle you are coming from when you talk about issues but all I can say is that come election, every eligible voter should come out in masses to vote for their preferred candidate, the best candidate that the office requires to lead the affairs of the nation. Please do not sell your vote, follow your conscience and vote the right person. Any mistake made this time is an automatic 8 years more for the nation because it is now a tradition that any government that clinch power would definitely do a complete 2 tenure and it has been on so vote wisely, do not be a puppet in the hands of the blood sucking politicians come general election this Saturday. Play safe and vote wisely.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: Sakanwa on February 21, 2023, 12:59:28 PMIn the forth coming election I am asking this to know what is really going on and how is it going to be, because alot of the citizens of Nigeria has really drop confident of vote because of what is going on, so how my question is what are your advice to the citizens on the forth coming election. Will you advise them to vote or not base on the current issues at hand.No matter what the current situation may be it is never an option to encourage political apathy, it's better for the citizens of Nigeria to go out on the day of election to cast their vote for their preferred candidate rather than hide under roofs and when the going becomes ugly they will be the first set of people that will start shouting, complaining and blaming the government for not doing their job when they ( those citizens that refused to vote) couldn't even come out to vote. So for me it's a yes, let them go out and cast their vote, if they're afraid that violence might occur then they should probably go to their polling unit very early that way they could avoid any issue that might arise later on.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: The right thing for anyone to do in this upcoming election is to vote. "Your vote is your right," so just do your part by voting first, but please play it safe if your pulling unit is not environmentally friendly and you shift to avoid being molested, harassed, or abused. I strongly believe this year's election will be different from the others. Let's just watch and see. All we pray for is a peaceful, free, and fair election.

comments.author: DaNNy001
comments.body: Election don already reach oo. Omo na just few days to  go oo and the tension don dey really increase as many Nigerians are looking forward to a change of presidency and hoping that this time maybe we can get a good president that can change things for good. Please my advice be say make no body sell their vote oo,  we don too suffer for this country oo every should willingly vote for the person they feel can move the country positively for the betterment of our life.  If you sell your vote you don sell your future or your children own.

comments.author: Justtoons
comments.body: With the situation of the country right now, only God can save Nigeria from the hands of bad governments. The long awaiting elections is just few days away, and all Nigerians hope that this election will bring a positive change into their lives. This country has suffered alot to the extend that we now buy money with money.  After this election and everything goes well as planned, then a good government is elected all Nigerians deserves a certificate of survival. We have really gone through hell. Please don't vote wisely oooo we didn't use our wisdom on the previous election. Let's all vote with sense, don't sell your votes for 5k and suffer for 8 years oooo. It's not worth it.please my fellow Nigerians. Let's consider our future.

comments.author: Alphakilo
comments.body: Will you advise them to vote or not base on the current issues at hand.[/quote]https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5440687.0Considering the present situations in Nigeria, like Naira scarcity, fuel scarcity, increase in price of commodities. The hardship in general, i see it as a very tangible reason for the Nigerians to turn out in mass and vote for whoever they think will make Nigeria a better place to live in. The average Nigerian are really seing shege this period. Nigerians must keep aside tribalism and religion to vote the right person who have the country at heart. My conclusion is that Nigerians should vote in forthcoming election in consideration with the present situation.

comments.author: Lida93
comments.body: Quote from: Sakanwa on February 21, 2023, 12:59:28 PMIn the forth coming election I am asking this to know what is really going on and how is it going to be, because alot of the citizens of Nigeria has really drop confident of vote because of what is going on, so how my question is what are your advice to the citizens on the forth coming election. Will you advise them to vote or not base on the current issues at hand.If I may ask, what is it that is going on, and what also are these current issues at hand that you're talking about? This 2023 elections is one that no Nigerian should exclude his or herself from coming out to exercise her franchise in that votes would count in this very elections more than any other elections ever held in Nigeria. There are no issues on ground of any kind that should make any legible voter not to come out to cast their vote to their candidate of choice.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Quote from: Sakanwa on February 21, 2023, 12:59:28 PMso how my question is what are your advice to the citizens on the forth coming election. Will you advise them to vote or not base on the current issues at hand.OP, Your statement is not complete because you fail to mention the issue at hand that you are referring to: is it the issue of the cashless policy, which Buhari and the CBN governor have been sure to court, or is it the issue of corruption? Recently, I read that some states have agreed that they will not vote for the Labour Party candidate unless they release the father of Biafra, who is named Nnamdi Kalu. I don't know if anyone else has read such news because I can't find the headline again. As a matter of fact, which issues are you talking about?Today is election day already; let citizens never stop themselves from going out to vote for whomever they think is the right person. I know that some people may not go out to vote because of the insecurity in their polling centers. Let God simply allow the right person to emerge as Nigeria's president.

comments.author: Smartvirus
comments.body: Election dey don come and go although, e never go finish as we still get days ahead for re-run election for units or states way katakata bee n too much. Nigerians try, to actually come out with there mind to come vote. Since them say na voting we dey carry elect new leaders to carry Nigeria to the next phase and there many compliants say, we no dey beleive in the voting process, now we don come out and vote but still, same rigging as has always been from the beginning of this we nation.We really need at least one fair election for this nation. No naw! How these men go dey do us like this and all our cries no dey touch anywhere!I no go still say make people no try to dey vote shah. We go dey try and one day, we go archive.
